name: North Pole Boogie
description:
Here's my game for the bitsy secret santa thing! Merry christmas thatguynm!

Frequently Asked Questions
Q: Why's it called boogie? There's no dancing in this game!
A: I dunno it just sounded nice

Q: Isn't this supposed to be a christmas game? Why'd you upload it so late?
A: I got super sick on the 25th so it took a while longer to finish this... sorry...

Q: Did anyone actually ask these questions or
A: No sorry i made them up

Made with bitsy by Adam Ledoux, using various hacks by Sean and mildmojo

thanks for playing 💖
